name: hardcore camping remastered v2.1.1
description:
The goal of this game is to collect as many logs as possible. You'll have to grab firewood and use it to fuel the fire. Maximize your score by loading as many logs into the fire at once as you can! Also, I heard that somewhere Floppa left you a gift marked '?'

If the fire goes out, you lose.

 The game has loud sounds

v2-added 2 items and 'cloudy copter'
